title: Bab Ssour
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan and vegetarian dishes are available, including various bean dishes, lentils, fava bean and vegetable soups, peppers and tomatoes cooked salad, cooked zucchini salad, various Moroccan fresh salads and others. Will gladly prepare vegan/vegetarian dishes on request and market availability. Relaxed atmosphere with some seating on floor and a terrace upstairs. Wi-fi. Located in the medina on the way to the main square, to the left down some steps.
